results.title: Differential Sex-Specific Effects of Angiotensin-Converting Enzyme Inhibition and Angiotensin Receptor Blocker Therapy on Arterial Function in Hypertension: CALIBREX Trial.
results.text_hl: There was a significant interaction by sex whereby the improvements in pulse wave velocity and central pulse @<m>DISEASE_Pressure_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003668 @@@pressure@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ compared with @CHEMICAL_candesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C081643 @@@candesartan@@@ were only observed in @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@.

results.title: Renoprotective effects of empagliflozin in type 1 and type 2 models of diabetic nephropathy superimposed with hypertension.
results.text_hl: Blood @<m>DISEASE_Pressure_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003668 @@@pressure@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypertrophy @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@renal hypertrophy@@@ were also reduced in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ treated with @CHEMICAL_empagliflozin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C570240 @@@empagliflozin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@.

results.title: Comparison of lisinopril and nitrendipine on the pulsatility index in mild essential arterial hypertension.
results.text_hl: The mean diastolic blood @<m>DISEASE_Pressure_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003668 @@@pressure@@@ was smaller with the @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ treatment than with the @CHEMICAL_Nitrendipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009568 @@@nitrendipine@@@ treatment.

results.title: Reduction of proteinuria by angiotensin converting enzyme inhibition.
results.text_hl: Both drug regimens significantly lowered blood @<m>DISEASE_Pressure_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003668 @@@pressure@@@, while only after 12 weeks of treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, blood @<m>DISEASE_Pressure_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003668 @@@pressure@@@ was significantly lower than during conventional therapy.

results.title: Blood pressure- and pulse pressure-lowering effects, trough:peak ratio and smoothness index of telmisartan compared with lisinopril.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: These data suggest that @CHEMICAL_Telmisartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077333 @@@telmisartan@@@ is as effective as @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ in reducing BP and @<m>DISEASE_Pressure_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003668 @@@PP@@@.

results.text_hl: Effect of @CHEMICAL_Carvedilol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077261 @@@carvedilol@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and their combination on vascular and cardiac health in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with borderline blood @<m>DISEASE_Pressure_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003668 @@@pressure@@@: the DETECT Study.

results.title: Pulse pressure lowering effect of dual blockade with candesartan and lisinopril vs. high-dose ACE inhibition in hypertensive type 2 diabetic subjects: a CALM II study post-hoc analysis.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: Twelve months of dual blockade with @CHEMICAL_candesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C081643 @@@candesartan@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ significantly reduced @<m>DISEASE_Pressure_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003668 @@@PP@@@ when compared with high-dose monotherapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@.

results.title: Noninvasive assessment of regional arteriolar and arterial dilating properties of lisinopril in healthy volunteers.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ induced a dose-dependent (significant after 20 mg) and long-lasting (< or = 8 h) decrease in @<m>DISEASE_Pressure_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003668 @@@mean arterial pressure@@@ (MAP, approximately 11% after 20 mg) that was related to a decrease in total peripheral resistance (TPR), because simultaneously heart rate (HR) and cardiac output (CO) were unchanged.

citations.NLM: Bellissant E, Thuillez C, Richer C, Pussard E, Giudicelli JF. Noninvasive assessment of regional arteriolar and arterial dilating properties of lisinopril in healthy volunteers. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1994 Sep;24(3):500-8. PMID: 7528307

results.title: Combination of lisinopril and nifedipine GITS increases blood pressure control compared with single drugs in essential hypertensive patients.
results.text_hl: Combination of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@ GITS increases blood @<m>DISEASE_Pressure_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003668 @@@pressure@@@ control compared with single drugs in @DISEASE_Essential_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000075222 @@@essential hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

results.title: Comparison of the hemodynamic and metabolic effects of low-dose hydrochlorothiazide and lisinopril treatment in obese patients with high blood pressure.
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ had a somewhat greater fall in both systolic (18 +/- 3 v 10 +/- 3 mm Hg) and diastolic (12 +/- 2 v 8 +/- 1 mm Hg) blood @<m>DISEASE_Pressure_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003668 @@@pressure@@@, but only the change in systolic @<m>DISEASE_Pressure_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003668 @@@pressure@@@ was statistically significant (P < .05).

PMID: 7662221
